mean_cn: n. 约会，约定，婚约，订婚
mean_en: an agreement to be married :the act of becoming engaged or the state of being engaged to be married
word_etyma: en在…中 + gage承诺 + ment名词后缀 → engagement 订婚
sentence: We announced our engagement last week, so now everybody knows we're getting married.
sentence_trans: 我们上周宣布了订婚消息，所以现在大家都知道我们要结婚了。
